short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for CS Ltd applications. It provides ability to work with digital signatures, various local devices, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for CS Ltd applications. It provides ability to directly print documents on working places, to work with digital signatures, various devices such as pos-terminals, card-readers, scanners, etc.
